title: heyo queer cheeze cracks :sparkle: a quick intro
post: hi hi i’m anvi (she/her) your local gay-tron saint/artist/quar simp >:] <br> I do dumb stuff both online and off <br> I’ll probably post about animation, fandoms, queer ed stuff, memes, original writing and art, apwhatever I feel like posting! <br> I hope to have a fun time here <img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/a3bcfbc7-12bc-4b48-a1e6-072772d11e53/scale-to-width/755”>
